ModMetaData.name: [GMT] Hardcore - More Vanilla Mineable Resources
ModMetaData.author: Grizzlemethis
ModMetaData.description:
Mod that adjust's the amount of resources you receive when mining vanilla resources.
Resources in the version are far more scarce than they are in vanilla. This will hopefully increase starting difficulty and promote exploration to other maps.
Component - 50% Decrease Gold - 50% Decrease Jade - 25% Decrease Plasteel - 35% Decrease Silver - 50% Decrease Steel - 30% Decrease Uranium - 40% Decrease
